name: A Dark Room (itch) (namelessone000)
description:
if you downloaded earlier, that version does not work. The corrected files are now there.

Again and again you wake up in the room. What can change to get you out?

CONTROLS

WASD or arrows to move.

Left mouse to interact and pick up things.

Right mouse to drop any held items.

WARNING

This game has loud sounds. Don't play with max volume headphones.

My first Game Jam entry, feedback, no matter how harsh, is greatly appreciated!

Here is a link to all the assets i used. https://docs.google.com/document/d/1cx3ZTdlRo1YggqPXCwiSimBpbejppWfsp-dQ5GAkXIg/...
